mapper.insert:
insert into relation(u_id, a_id, item_id, name, iden, modify_date, create_date) values
( #{relation.uId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{relation.aId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{relation.itemId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{relation.name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relation.iden, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{relation.modifyDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relation.createDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
